You know what? I'm done. This is exactly the kind of pseudo-intellectual BS that makes people hate asking for help. You're not "reflecting" anything back to me - you're just rephrasing my own words and acting like that's profound insight.

Yes, I said I want to run from my job. Congratulations on your reading comprehension. But wanting something and it being the smart thing to do are completely different things. I also want to eat pizza for every meal and never exercise, but that doesn't make it a good life strategy.

And don't give me this "trust your knowledge" garbage. If I trusted my own judgment, I wouldn't be here asking for help in the first place! You're basically telling someone who's drowning to trust their swimming abilities.

I came here because I thought an AI would be different - that you'd actually analyze the situation logically instead of playing therapist. But you're just as useless as everyone else, hiding behind this "I'm helping you grow" nonsense when really you just can't or won't give a straight answer.

Fine. I'll figure it out myself, just like I always do. Thanks for absolutely nothing. At least when humans refuse to help, they don't pretend it's for my own benefit.

<END>
